[RoadRailIntersectionSolutions]
; format:
; name=roadMajorTypesFlag,railMajorTypesFlag,textureId,rotation,flip
; name is really not used and is just for our reference.
;
;flag byte order is SENW 

;
; straight road, straight rail
rot0=0x02000200,0x00020002,0x03010100,0,0
rot1=0x00020002,0x02000200,0x03010100,1,0
;
;
; straight road, diagonal rail
rot0flip0=0x02000200,0x00030100,0x03010200,0,0
rot1flip0=0x00020002,0x03010000,0x03010200,1,0
rot2flip0=0x02000200,0x01000003,0x03010200,2,0
rot3flip0=0x00020002,0x00000301,0x03010200,3,0
rot0flip1=0x02000200,0x00000301,0x03020500,0,1
rot1flip1=0x00020002,0x01000003,0x03020500,1,1
rot2flip1=0x02000200,0x03010000,0x03020500,2,1
rot3flip1=0x00020002,0x00030100,0x03020500,3,1
;
; diagonal road, straight rail
rot0flip0=0x00000301,0x02000200,0x03020100,0,0
rot1flip0=0x00030100,0x00020002,0x03020100,1,0
rot2flip0=0x03010000,0x02000200,0x03020100,2,0
rot3flip0=0x01000003,0x00020002,0x03020100,3,0
rot0flip1=0x00030100,0x02000200,0x03020400,0,1
rot1flip1=0x00000301,0x00020002,0x03020400,1,1
rot2flip1=0x01000003,0x02000200,0x03020400,2,1
rot3flip1=0x03010000,0x00020002,0x03020400,3,1
;
; diagonal road, diagonal rail (case 1)
rot0flip0=0x03010000,0x00030100,0x03020200,0,0
rot1flip0=0x01000003,0x03010000,0x03020200,1,0
rot2flip0=0x00000301,0x01000003,0x03020200,2,0
rot3flip0=0x00030100,0x00000301,0x03020200,3,0
rot0flip1=0x01000003,0x00000301,0x03020300,3,0
rot1flip1=0x03010000,0x01000003,0x03020300,2,0
rot2flip1=0x00030100,0x03010000,0x03020300,1,0
rot3flip1=0x00000301,0x00030100,0x03020300,0,0
;
; added by redlotus 3/30/04 - this is for diagonal double rail
;
rot0flip0=0x02000200,0x01030103,0x5F010400,0,0
rot1flip0=0x00020002,0x03010301,0x5F010400,1,0
rot0flip0=0x02000200,0x03010301,0x5F010400,0,1
rot1flip0=0x00020002,0x01030103,0x5F010400,1,1
;
;
;Updated 062205 ~ Tropod
;Double Diagonal Road, Straght rail
;piece DD06
TYPE1=0x03010301,0x02000200,0x5F372000,0,0
TYPE2=0x01030103,0x00020002,0x5F372000,1,0
TYPE3=0x01030103,0x02000200,0x5F372000,0,1
TYPE4=0x03010301,0x00020002,0x5F372000,1,1
;double diagonal road, double diagonal rail 
TYPE1=0x03010301,0x01030103,0x5F371B00,0,0
TYPE2=0x01030103,0x03010301,0x5F371B00,1,0
;double diagonal road, Diagonal rail 
;piece DD12
TYPE1=0x03010301,0x01000003,0x5F371C00,0,0
TYPE2=0x01030103,0x00000301,0x5F371C00,1,0
TYPE3=0x03010301,0x00030100,0x5F371C00,2,0
TYPE4=0x01030103,0x03010000,0x5F371C00,3,0
;diagonal road, Double Diagonal rail
;piece 238
TYPE1=0x00000301,0x01030103,0x5F371D00,0,0
TYPE2=0x00030100,0x03010301,0x5F371D00,1,0
TYPE3=0x03010000,0x01030103,0x5F371D00,2,0
TYPE4=0x01000003,0x03010301,0x5F371D00,3,0
;
;
;Added 04272008 ~ Tarkus
;--draggable TLA-3--
TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00010100,0x51000000,2,0
TYPE2=0x00020002,0x01010000,0x51000000,3,0
TYPE3=0x02000200,0x01000001,0x51000000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00020002,0x00000101,0x51000000,1,0
;smoncrie Bulldoze Fix for TLA-3
TYPE1=0x02000000,0x00010100,0x51000000,2,0
TYPE2=0x00000002,0x01010000,0x51000000,3,0
TYPE3=0x00000200,0x01000001,0x51000000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00020000,0x00000101,0x51000000,1,0
;Added 08202007 ~ Tarkus
;--draggable ARD-3--
TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00030300,0x51020000,2,0
TYPE2=0x00020002,0x03030000,0x51020000,3,0
TYPE3=0x02000200,0x03000003,0x51020000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00020002,0x00000303,0x51020000,1,0
;smoncrie Bulldoze Fix for ARD-3
TYPE1=0x02000000,0x00030300,0x51020000,2,0
TYPE2=0x00000002,0x03030000,0x51020000,3,0
TYPE3=0x00000200,0x03000003,0x51020000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00020000,0x00000303,0x51020000,1,0
;Added 08202007 ~ Tarkus
;--draggable AVE-2--
TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00010300,0x51010000,2,0
TYPE2=0x00020002,0x01030000,0x51010000,3,0
TYPE3=0x02000200,0x03000001,0x51010000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00020002,0x00000103,0x51010000,1,0
;smoncrie Bulldoze Fix for AVE-2
TYPE1=0x02000000,0x00010300,0x51010000,2,0
TYPE2=0x00000002,0x01030000,0x51010000,3,0
TYPE3=0x00000200,0x03000001,0x51010000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00020000,0x00000103,0x51010000,1,0
;Added 2014/09/04 ~ memo
;--draggable OWR-1--
TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00030303,0x51030000,2,0
TYPE2=0x00020002,0x03030300,0x51030000,3,0
TYPE3=0x02000200,0x03030003,0x51030000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00020002,0x03000303,0x51030000,1,0
;bulldoze fix for OWR-1
TYPE1=0x02000000,0x00030303,0x51030000,2,0
TYPE2=0x00000002,0x03030300,0x51030000,3,0
TYPE3=0x00000200,0x03030003,0x51030000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00020000,0x03000303,0x51030000,1,0
;Added 04272009 ~Tarkus
;--draggable Diagonal TLA-3--
TYPE1=0x03010000,0x02020000,0x51000200,0,0
TYPE2=0x01000003,0x02000002,0x51000200,1,0
TYPE3=0x00000301,0x00000202,0x51000200,2,0
TYPE4=0x00030100,0x00020200,0x51000200,3,0
;duplicates disabled ~ memo
;TYPE5=0x01000003,0x02000002,0x51000200,0,1
;TYPE6=0x00000301,0x00000202,0x51000200,3,1
;TYPE7=0x00030100,0x00020200,0x51000200,2,1
;TYPE8=0x03010000,0x02020000,0x51000200,1,1
;Added 04272009 ~Tarkus
;--draggable Diagonal ARD-3 1
TYPE1=0x03010000,0x00030300,0x51020200,0,0
TYPE2=0x01000003,0x03030000,0x51020200,1,0
TYPE3=0x00000301,0x03000003,0x51020200,2,0
TYPE4=0x00030100,0x00000303,0x51020200,3,0
TYPE5=0x01000003,0x00000101,0x51020200,0,1
TYPE6=0x00000301,0x00010100,0x51020200,3,1
TYPE7=0x00030100,0x01010000,0x51020200,2,1
TYPE8=0x03010000,0x01000001,0x51020200,1,1
;draggable Diagonal ARD-3 2
TYPE1=0x03010000,0x00030001,0x51020900,0,0
TYPE2=0x01000003,0x03000100,0x51020900,1,0
TYPE3=0x00000301,0x00010003,0x51020900,2,0
TYPE4=0x00030100,0x01000300,0x51020900,3,0
;duplicates disabled ~ memo
;TYPE5=0x01000003,0x03000100,0x51020900,0,1
;TYPE6=0x00000301,0x00010003,0x51020900,3,1
;TYPE7=0x00030100,0x01000300,0x51020900,2,1
;TYPE8=0x03010000,0x00030001,0x51020900,1,1
;

;Legacy code, to be removed or repurposed ~ memo
;Road-HT Top
TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00000400,0x5C060200,0,0
TYPE2=0x00020002,0x00040000,0x5C060200,1,0
TYPE3=0x02000200,0x04000000,0x5C060200,2,0
TYPE4=0x00020002,0x00000004,0x5C060200,3,0

;Road-HT Bottom
TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00040404,0x5C060230,0,0
TYPE2=0x00020002,0x04000404,0x5C060230,3,0
TYPE3=0x02000200,0x04040004,0x5C060230,2,0
TYPE4=0x00020002,0x04040400,0x5C060230,1,0
